column1: Little Goat Diner////An upscale diner with pretty bold food combinations. Definitely fulfilling
column3: and something you probably won't find at any regular old diner. I came in for brunch on a Saturday. While we waited to be seated
column4: we went to the Little Goat Bakery and I got The Little Goat coffee (espresso
column7: marsala) and the flavors combine in a really unique way-- hot
